title: Ranked is a joke
body:
Plays ranked.
ADC afks. 4v5
Janna then afks. 3v5.
Jarvan afks. 2v5.
Only my mate and I playing in a 2v5 and yet we lost lp for that.
GG matchmaking

(btw, not sure if this topic is in the right section of the forums)

replies.body:
This probably isn't the right section. This board is more to help other players with their technical issues in playing League. You might want to head over to the Misc. boards for this sort of stuff, though I'm sure no-one will appreciate it.

You can report players for AFK'ing by using the report system in-client. If you somehow missed that opportunity, you can submit a support ticket about it.

Hopefully you won't be put into a 2v5 again.
